channel.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
channel.description:
I have been thinking about buying a Circuit by Novation. It's basically a hardware version of Auxy, aka a Groovebox.
Has anyone used one before? Should I buy one?

item.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Nice, mate!

Also, I like that you have your priorities in order. That’s not easy.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"

item.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yeah if you got the dough for it I’d get it, will compliment that setup perfectly lol. One of these days when the kids are older I’ll get to set up a proper home studio again (and actually have time for it!!)

Read full topic

item.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Would you be using midi clips in Live to trigger the hardware, recorded back in, and the midi clips are triggered from the Circuit?

You got my midi / synth mind going lol

Read full topic

item.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Makes sense. I think for people using Live it’s a solid buy. I’d have a tough time incorporating it into the software I would be using so I’d prolly be more interested in the standalone capabilities. But your use case sounds like a perfect match!

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"

item.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
I am actually getting into hardware synths, so I wanted this to be the heart of my setup, so it would basically be the MIDI clock, to everything else, not so much an All-in-One rig.

But, as far as MIDI control, I’ve already got a few controllers, so I wouldn’t use the Circuit as a controller, but I would route the audio and MIDI clock to my audio interface into Ableton Live.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"

item.title: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’ve thought about it too but I’m really in no position right now to drop any kind of money like that… too much stuff to do around the house.

It looks like a great piece of kit though. There’s a lot to be said for an all in one HARDWARE box, there’s just nothing like a physical control surface.

From what I’ve read most owners are VERY satisfied with their purchase. Last piece of kit I had like this was an Electribe EM1 (two pcm synths, 8 drum parts I think?) - I gave it to a friend, wish I still had it

Also, if you’re using Live I think it would make a pretty killer MIDI controller. Not too sure how useful it’d be in any other DAW.

Just my dos pence

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a Novation Circuit - "Hardware Auxy?"
